Package com.example.binarybandits.controllers

Class AuthController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.binarybandits.controllers.AuthController
  • public class AuthController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for authenticating the user's input on Login/Signup page. Outstanding issues: -App asks user for full name, but full name is not used anywhere in the app's current state

      • login

        public static void login​(android.content.Context ctx,
                         java.lang.String username)
        Attempt to login the user based on inputted username. If a Player with the requested username is not found in the database, show a message and prompt the user to enter a different username. Otherwise, go to home page.
        Parameters:
        ctx - context of function call
        username - username of Player to find in database

      • register

        public static void register​(android.content.Context ctx,
                            java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String phone)
        Register the user in the database. If a Player in the database has a user's requested username, show a message and do not add Player to database.
        Parameters:
        ctx - context of the function call
        username - player's username
        name - player's full name
        phone - player's phone number
